flavor_text_entries.diamond:
Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin
so vile that even a scratch could
prove fatal.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
The toxin made in its poison sacs
is pumped to the knuckle claws
through tubes down its arms.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
It has a poison sac at its throat.
When it croaks, the stored poison
is churned for greater potency.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
Swaying and dodging the attacks of its
foes, it weaves its flexible body in close,
then lunges out with its poisonous claws.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Swaying and dodging the attacks of its
foes, it weaves its flexible body in close,
then lunges out with its poisonous claws.
flavor_text_entries.black:
It has a poison sac at its throat.
When it croaks, the stored poison
is churned for greater potency.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It has a poison sac at its throat.
When it croaks, the stored poison
is churned for greater potency.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
The croaking that Toxicroak produces
before a battle is for churning the
poison it has stored in its poison sac.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
The croaking that Toxicroak produces
before a battle is for churning the
poison it has stored in its poison sac.
flavor_text_entries.x:
It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks,
the stored poison is churned for greater potency.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a
scratch could prove fatal.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks,
the stored poison is churned for greater potency.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a
scratch could prove fatal.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
It bounces toward opponents and gouges them
with poisonous claws. No more than a scratch
is needed to knock out its adversaries.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It booms out a victory croak when its prey
goes down in defeat. This Pokémon and
Seismitoad are related species.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
Its crimson claws contain a virulent toxin. This toxin can be made
into a tonic by diluting it, mixing it with several types of wild
grass, and boiling it down over two days.
